actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to permit any person otherwise eligible to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1977 to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1976.

summary.text: Permits any person otherwise eligible to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1977 to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1976.

titles.title: A bill to permit any person otherwise eligible to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1977 to become a naturalized citizen during calendar year 1976.
